1.0.1.name: wordpress/bookitme-weather-station
1.0.1.description:
The Bookitme Weather Station lets you add weather forecast directly into your page and widgets
Simply adding a shortcode [bookitme-weather] [bookitme-mobile-weather] [bookitme-weather-json] and to a page. You can set VIDEO or IMAGE for weather forecast background. Parameters are available for setup in the plugin ADMIN interface. See the Plugin screenshots for examples.

Sent email into weather@bookitme.com for your API with City and Country name

NEW WEATHER API WILL BE GENERATED DEMAND ON YOUR REQUEST from email weather@bookitme.com

More information about BOOKITME WEATHER STATION API and integration to your web page you can find at http://www.bookitme.com/weather/

DIRECT LINK BOOKITME WEATHER STATION
